title: bajarE maanasa
sahitya:
bhajarE mAnasa shrI raghuvIram bhakta janAdhAram

anupallavi

 aja mahArAjAtmaja vara putram nija dAsa hrdaya nIraja mitram

caraNam 1

 sanaka sanandana sannuta caritam sakala jagat bharitam 
anavaratAshrita kaluSApa hrtam avyAja krpayA dhrta bharitam
 
caraNam 2

 shyAmaLa sannibha sundara gAtram candra kaLAdhara mitram 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata sannuti pAtram
